snippet: The Post and Courier won its award for a series on domestic abuse; two of The New York Times’s awards were for its Ebola coverage.
abstract: Post and Courier of Charleston, SC, wins public service Pulitzer Prize for domestic violence series; New York Times wins three Pulitzer Prizes, most of any news organization; other winners noted.
lead_paragraph: The Post and Courier won its award for a series on domestic abuse; two of The New York Times’s awards were for its Ebola coverage.

headline.main: 2015 Pulitzer Winners: South Carolina Paper Wins Public Service Prize; New York Times Wins 3
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Paper Wins Top Pulitzer; The Times Is Awarded 3 Prizes
